description:
Lovely beautiful and quiet studio located in the heart of wonderful chelsea.
The best location in the city, very quiet and walk distance everywhere.
it's a sharing bathroom with the next door neighbor only. Ofcourse the bathroom is very clean. It's a small boutique building which has sharing bathroom in each floor. 3 floors total 2 apt each floor, other then that you have all the information at the post. Very cozy and beautiful studio
name: Amazing studio in the heart of chelsea!
review: Awesome location for a reasonable price. Liad was also very flexible with check in and check out times. Would definitely recommend! You might want to bring flip flops with you though as the bathroom is outside the room.
